meanings.definition: Timeworkers: People who work for a specified period of time.
meanings.sent1: The timeworkers arrived promptly at 9 AM to start their shift.
meanings.sent2: The company hired more timeworkers to help with the busy season.
meanings.sent3: The timeworkers decided to have a race to see who could finish their tasks first.
meanings.sent4: The timeworkers were like clock hands, moving steadily and efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The supervisor praised the timeworkers for their punctuality and dedication.

meanings.definition: Timeworkers: The act of working for a specific amount of time.
meanings.sent1: Punching in and out accurately is crucial for timeworkers.
meanings.sent2: The concept of timeworkers is common in many industries.
meanings.sent3: The timeworkers set a timer to see who could complete the task in the shortest time.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to slow down as the timeworkers focused on their tasks.
meanings.sent5: The manager emphasized the importance of timeworkers completing their hours efficiently.
